languages.text: "Чушь! Тисифона создала Атлас лишь несколько сотен лет назад, а история Дома Орселлио уходит корнями в прошлое тысячелетие! Мы всегда были могущественным Домом, вот только по прибытии в Простор Тисифона возжелала обрясть такую силу, чтобы ее ветвь захватила власть над всеми остальными. И к чему это нас привело? Наши тела осквернены ксеноересью! Бог-Император, прости детей своих за непростительный грех..."

traits.locale_text: "Чушь! Тисифона создала Атлас лишь несколько сотен лет назад, а история Дома Орселлио уходит корнями в прошлое тысячелетие! Мы всегда были могущественным домом, вот только по прибытии в Простор Тисифона возжелала обрясть такую силу, чтобы ее ветвь захватила власть над всеми остальными. И к чему это нас привело? Наши тела осквернены ксеноересью! Бог-Император, прости детей своих за непростительный грех..."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Nonsense! Tisiphone created the Atlas only a few centuries ago, whereas the history of House Orsellio dates back to the last millennium! We have always been a House to be reckoned with, but when Tisiphone arrived in the Expanse, she set her sights on acquiring power that could let her family branch dominate the rest. And where has that left us? Our bodies are corrupted with xenoheresy! God-Emperor, forgive Your children for committing a trespass so heinous..."
languages.original_text: "Чушь! Тисифона создала Атлас лишь несколько сотен лет назад, а история Дома Орселлио уходит корнями в прошлое тысячелетие! Мы всегда были могущественным Домом, вот только по прибытии в Простор Тисифона возжелала обрясть такую силу, чтобы ее ветвь захватила власть над всеми остальными. И к чему это нас привело? Наши тела осквернены ксеноересью! Бог-Император, прости детей своих за непростительный грех..."

traits.locale_text: "Nonsense! Tisiphone created the Atlas only a few centuries ago, whereas the history of House Orsellio dates back to the last millennium! We have always been a House to be reckoned with, but when Tisiphone arrived in the Koronus Expanse, she set her sights on acquiring power that could let her family branch dominate the rest. And where has that left us now? Our bodies are corrupted with xenoheresy! God-Emperor, forgive Your children for committing a trespass so heinous..."

We have always been a House to be reckoned with, but when Tisiphone arrived in the Expanse, she set her sights on acquiring power that could let her family branch dominate the rest. And where has that left us? Our bodies are corrupted with xenoheresy! God-Emperor, forgive Your children for committing a trespass so heinous..."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: 「馬鹿なことを言うな！ティシフォンがアトラスを作ったのは数世紀前の話、だがオーセリオ家の歴史は前千年紀までさかのぼる！私たちはずっと家頼みで生きてきた。だが、ティシフォンがエクスパンスに着いたとき、彼女は分家にその他大勢を支配させるために力を得ようとした。それで今何が残っている？この身体は異端の異種族どもに汚されてしまった！神帝陛下よ、悪質な罪を犯したあなたの子らをお許しください…」
languages.original_text: "Nonsense! Tisiphone created the Atlas only a few centuries ago, whereas the history of House Orsellio dates back to the last millennium! We have always been a House to be reckoned with, but when Tisiphone arrived in the Expanse, she set her sights on acquiring power that could let her family branch dominate the rest. And where has that left us? Our bodies are corrupted with xenoheresy! God-Emperor, forgive Your children for committing a trespass so heinous..."

traits.locale_text: 「馬鹿なことを言うな！ティシフォンがアトラスを作ったのは数世紀前の話、だがオーセリオ家の歴史は前千年紀までさかのぼる！私たちはずっと家頼みで生きてきた。だが、ティシフォンがエクスパンスに着いたとき、彼女は分家にその他大勢を支配させるために力を得ようとした。それで今何が残っている？この身体は異端の異種族どもに汚されてしまった！神帝陛下よ、悪質な罪を犯したあなたの子らをお許しください…」
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: “胡说八道！提西福涅几百年前才创造了圣仪，可奥赛罗家族的历史能追溯到几千年前！我们一直都是个强大的家族，可提西福涅来到科罗努斯扩区扩区之后，她却全心全意渴求力量，导致家族内部冲突不断。看看我们现在变成了什么样子？我们的身体遭到了异形邪说的腐化！神皇在上，请宽恕您的子民吧，我们居然犯下了如此大逆不道的罪行……”
languages.original_text: "Nonsense! Tisiphone created the Atlas only a few centuries ago, whereas the history of House Orsellio dates back to the last millennium! We have always been a House to be reckoned with, but when Tisiphone arrived in the Expanse, she set her sights on acquiring power that could let her family branch dominate the rest. And where has that left us? Our bodies are corrupted with xenoheresy! God-Emperor, forgive Your children for committing a trespass so heinous..."

traits.locale_text: “胡说八道！提西福涅几百年前才创造了圣仪，可奥塞罗家族的历史能追溯到几千年前！我们一直都是个强大的家族，可提西福涅来到科罗努斯扩区扩区之后，她却全心全意渴求力量，导致家族内部冲突不断。看看我们现在变成了什么样子？我们的身体遭到了异形邪说的腐化！神皇在上，请宽恕您的子民吧，我们居然犯下了如此大逆不道的罪行……”
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: « Balivernes ! L'Atlas a été créé il y a quelques siècles seulement, alors que la maison Orsellio existe depuis plus d'un millénaire ! Notre maison a toujours été redoutable, mais quand Tisiphone est arrivée dans les Étendues, elle s'est mis en tête d'acquérir un pouvoir qui permettrait à sa famille de dominer les autres. Et regardez le résultat ! Nos corps sont souillés par de la xénohérésie ! Empereur-Dieu, pardonnez vos enfants pour ce crime odieux... »
languages.original_text: "Nonsense! Tisiphone created the Atlas only a few centuries ago, whereas the history of House Orsellio dates back to the last millennium! We have always been a House to be reckoned with, but when Tisiphone arrived in the Expanse, she set her sights on acquiring power that could let her family branch dominate the rest. And where has that left us? Our bodies are corrupted with xenoheresy! God-Emperor, forgive Your children for committing a trespass so heinous..."

traits.locale_text: « Balivernes ! L'Atlas a été créé il y a quelques siècles seulement, alors que la maison Orsellio existe depuis plus d'un millénaire ! Notre maison a toujours été redoutable, mais quand Tisiphone est arrivée dans les Étendues, elle s'est mis en tête d'acquérir un pouvoir qui permettrait à sa famille de dominer les autres. Et regardez le résultat ! Nos corps sont souillés par de la xénohérésie ! Empereur-Dieu, pardonnez vos enfants pour ce crime odieux... »
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: «¡Ridículo! Tisiphone creó el Atlas hace solo unos siglos, pero ¡la historia de la casa Orsellio se remonta al milenio pasado! Siempre hemos sido una casa poderosa, pero, cuando Tisiphone llegó a la Extensión, dedicó sus esfuerzos a adquirir un poder que permitiera a su rama de la familia dominar a las demás. Y ¿cómo hemos acabado a consecuencia? ¡Nuestros cuerpos están corrompidos por la xenoherejía! Dios Emperador, perdona a Tus hijos por tan execrable transgresión...».
languages.original_text: "Nonsense! Tisiphone created the Atlas only a few centuries ago, whereas the history of House Orsellio dates back to the last millennium! We have always been a House to be reckoned with, but when Tisiphone arrived in the Expanse, she set her sights on acquiring power that could let her family branch dominate the rest. And where has that left us? Our bodies are corrupted with xenoheresy! God-Emperor, forgive Your children for committing a trespass so heinous..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ridículo! Tisiphone creó el Atlas hace solo unos siglos, pero ¡la historia de la casa Orsellio se remonta al milenio pasado! Siempre hemos sido una casa poderosa, pero, cuando Tisiphone llegó a la Extensión, dedicó sus esfuerzos a adquirir un poder que permitiera a su rama de la familia dominar a las demás. Y ¿cómo hemos acabado a consecuencia? ¡Nuestros cuerpos están corrompidos por la xenoherejía! Dios Emperador, perdona a Tus hijos por tan execrable transgresión...».
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Unsinn! Tisiphone hat den Atlas erst vor wenigen Jahrhunderten erschaffen, doch die Geschichte des Hauses Orsellio reicht bis ins letzte Jahrtausend zurück! Wir waren schon immer ein mächtiges Haus. Als Tisiphone aber in die Ausdehnung gekommen ist, hat sie es sich zum Ziel gesetzt, möglichst viel Macht zu sammeln. So viel, dass ihr Zweig der Familie die anderen dominieren kann. Und wohin hat uns das geführt? Unsere Körper sind von Xeno-Ketzerei verdorben! Gottimperator, vergebt Euren Kindern diese ungeheuerliche, schändliche Sünde ..."
languages.original_text: "Nonsense! Tisiphone created the Atlas only a few centuries ago, whereas the history of House Orsellio dates back to the last millennium! We have always been a House to be reckoned with, but when Tisiphone arrived in the Expanse, she set her sights on acquiring power that could let her family branch dominate the rest. And where has that left us? Our bodies are corrupted with xenoheresy! God-Emperor, forgive Your children for committing a trespass so heinous..."

traits.locale_text: "Unsinn! Tisiphone hat den Atlas erst vor wenigen Jahrhunderten erschaffen, doch die Geschichte des Hauses Orsellio reicht bis ins letzte Jahrtausend zurück! Wir waren schon immer ein mächtiges Haus. Als Tisiphone aber in die Ausdehnung gekommen ist, hat sie es sich zum Ziel gesetzt, möglichst viel Macht zu sammeln. So viel, dass ihr Zweig der Familie die anderen dominieren kann. Und wohin hat uns das geführt? Unsere Körper sind von Xeno-Ketzerei verdorben! Gottimperator, vergebt Euren Kindern diese ungeheuerliche, schändliche Sünde ..."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Saçmalık! Tisiphone, Atlas'ı sadece birkaç yüzyıl önce yaratmıştı. Orsellio Hanesi'nin tarihiyse geçen binyıla uzanır! Hanemiz daima hafife alınmayacak bir kuvvet olmuştur ancak Tisiphone, Enginlik'e gelince kendi aile soyunu diğerlerinden üstün kılacak bir güç elde etmeye kafayı koydu. Peki bunun sonucunda ne elde ettik? Vücutlarımız, zeno kâfirliğiyle yozlaştırıldı! Tanrı İmparator, böylesine iğrenç bir suç işleyen çocuklarını affet."
languages.original_text: "Nonsense! Tisiphone created the Atlas only a few centuries ago, whereas the history of House Orsellio dates back to the last millennium! We have always been a House to be reckoned with, but when Tisiphone arrived in the Expanse, she set her sights on acquiring power that could let her family branch dominate the rest. And where has that left us? Our bodies are corrupted with xenoheresy! God-Emperor, forgive Your children for committing a trespass so heinous..."

traits.locale_text: "Saçmalık! Tisiphone, Atlas'ı sadece birkaç yüzyıl önce yaratmıştı; oysa Orsellio Hanesi'nin tarihi, geçen binyıla uzanır! Hanemiz daima hafife alınmayacak bir kuvvet olmuştur ancak Tisiphone, Enginlik'e gelince kendi aile soyunu diğerlerinden üstün kılacak bir güç elde etmekte kararlıydı. Peki bunun sonucunda ne elde ettik? Vücutlarımız, zeno kâfirliğiyle yozlaştırılmış! Tanrı İmparator, böylesine iğrenç bir suç işleyen çocuklarını affet..."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader
